all_entities.context: Congratulations! You won 25 lakh rupees. Pay

conversation_transcript.message: Congratulations! You won 25 lakh rupees. Pay 5000 processing fee to claim.

Rajesh Kumar here! *adjusts glasses* Oh my goodness, 25 lakh rupees?! *excited* That's amazing news! *nervously* I'm so grateful, I could really use the money to help my children. *eagerly* Where do I need to send the processing fee? *curiously* Can you tell me more about this wonderful opportunity? *trustingly*
